channel.title: Need help with pvp timers
channel.description: how do i add a 10 second timer for the banks for when a person runs in i have at least 10 seconds to kill him.

item.title: Need help with pvp timers
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

for this first we need to have a timer, and then we need to modify the attack process, usually we would say if (isinwilderness){

im gonna write this in words, if you can’t code it, you don’t need it
you need a value on the person called ‘beingattack’
when the player is attacked beingattack = 1
when the player isn’t under attak beingattack = 1
^^idk how you gonna get that to work
if (!isinwilderness && beingattack = 1){
start timer proccess

good luck

Read full topic
